title: I want to play loud music, but my neighbors won't allow it. What should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: If it isn’t loud enough that they can feel it shaking their house up then it shouldn’t be a problem. However you need to respect their wishes, and they privacy. If you live in a house then you have a bit more freedom to blast your music. If you live in an apartment however, then the walls are probably thin and you’re going to have to respect them. NO ONE likes not being able to have peace and quiet. If you do live in an apartment then you’re going to have to lower the volume and deal with it. Talk to someone like a police officer to see when loud music becomes a public disturbance, that way you’ll really know how loud you can play your music.

I would play loud music anyway lol, but maybe that is just me haha! i thought during the day you can play music as loud as you like from a certain time in the morning til a certain time at night, that is what i was told anyway. the laws about this might be different in different towns/countries depending on where it is you are living! otherwise as suggested i would buy the bluetooth headphones with noise cancellation, so it blocks out outside noise ie lawnmowers, chainsaws etc, but lets you listen to your music as loud as you like and your neighbors won’t be annoyed when you keep listening to your music so loud!
